
import WithStatusBar from '@/src/components/WithStatusBar';

<WithStatusBar statusItems={[["Status", "200"], ["Content-Type", "application/json"]]}>
  <CH.Code>
  ```typescript LoginGoogle.ts
  import { HathoraCloud } from "@hathora/cloud-sdk-typescript";

async function run() {
  const sdk = new HathoraCloud({
    hathoraDevToken: "<YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN_HERE>",
    appId: "app-af469a92-5b45-4565-b3c4-b79878de67d2",
  });

  const loginGoogleRequest = {
    idToken: "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImZkNDhhNzUxMzhkOWQ0OGYwYWE2MzVlZjU2OWM0ZTE5NmY3YWU4ZDYiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ.",
  };
  const appId = "app-af469a92-5b45-4565-b3c4-b79878de67d2";
  
  const res = await sdk.authV1.loginGoogle(loginGoogleRequest, appId);

  if (res?.statusCode !== 200) {
    throw new Error("Unexpected status code: " + res?.statusCode || "-");
  }
  
  // handle response
}

run();
  ```
  ---

  ```json ExampleÂ Response
  {
    "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ0eXBlIjoiYW5vbnltb3VzIiwiaWQiOiJ3aDA4eWN3eTJwOSIsIm5hbWUiOiJqaXR0ZXJ5LXNhbG1vbi1ndWxsIiwiaWF0IjoxNjg5MzQ5MTk3fQ.-LzlPhZw2tw0ycZ229IRHwwmINGKWNPFMDrXOphLjEk"
  }
  ```
  </CH.Code>
</WithStatusBar>
